meanings.sent1: The dentulous smile of the child brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The dentist confirmed that the patient was dentulous.
meanings.sent3: The dentulous puppy chewed on everything in sight.
meanings.sent4: The dentulous forest was a sight to behold with its countless trees.
meanings.sent5: Her dentulous grin revealed a row of pearly whites.

meanings.sent1: The dentulous cat purred contentedly after its meal.
meanings.sent2: The dentulous predator stalked its prey silently.
meanings.sent3: The dentulous rabbit nibbled on the fresh grass with delight.
meanings.sent4: The dentulous keys of the piano created a melodious tune.
meanings.sent5: His dentulous mouth crunched on the crispy apple.

meanings.sent1: The dentulous dinosaur roared loudly in the prehistoric jungle.
meanings.sent2: The dentulous shark patrolled the ocean waters with power.
meanings.sent3: The dentulous comb made brushing through the tangled hair easier.
meanings.sent4: The dentulous gears of the clock ticked rhythmically.
meanings.sent5: The dentulous fence surrounded the garden, protecting it from intruders.
